thread.title: Here are all the 76ers' potential draft picks in the next few years and what trades got them
thread.title_full: Here are all the 76ers' potential draft picks in the next few years and what trades got them

author: Jonathan Tannenwald
title: Here are all the 76ers' potential draft picks in the next few years and what trades got them
text:
Here are all the 76ers' potential draft picks in the next few years and what trades got them Updated: February 20, 2017 â€” 3:46 PM EST 137 Share 
they had acquired the Lakers' pick in 2012 . 

the 2015 trade that sent the rights to two European prospects to the Kings for Nik Stauskas, Carl Landry and Jason Thompson. Sacramento's pick has a weird protection on it, though. If the Kings land in spots 11-30, the pick goes to the Chicago Bulls. If it lands in the top 10, the 76ers have a right to swap their pick for it. 
a series of trades involving those teams and the Toronto Raptors in 2013, 2014, 2015 and 2016. The 76ers ultimately landed the pick in 2016 when they traded Kendall Marshall to Utah. 
one that sent Brandon Davies to Brooklyn for the pick and Andrei Kirilenko ; and one that sent Chukwudiebere Maduabum to Cleveland and Sasha Kaun (briefly) to Philadelphia. 
the 76ers' sending Arnett Moultrie to the Knicks for the pick in 2014. 
the 76ers then acquired the pick and Marquis Teague from the Nets in 2014 when they dealt Casper Ware to Brooklyn. 
.
